name: Aurum
relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_attacks} or is {ACTION_attacked}, this relic also {ACTION_attacks} that enemy.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks}, it afflicts its target with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}.
This relic's attacks always deal critical damage.
The bearer deals 10% additional damage for each enemy afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}.
After an enemy {ACTION_defends} or {ACTION_provokes}, this relic afflicts it with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks}, it increases the bearer's highest stat by 5%.
This relic and its bearer deal additional damage to enemies equal to 10% of the damage they've taken from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON} in the current battle.
After an enemy takes damage from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}, it is afflicted with a random debuff.
This relic {ACTION_attacks} 1 additional time for each enemy afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_POISON}.
title: God of Extinction
